slideCmdHdr.Title: Slide
slideCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Captures a specific state of the markup, sections, measurements, annotations, etc.
slideCmdHdr.LongHelp: Whenever you create a new slide, the current viewpoint is copied in the new slide.
DMUFormatCmdHdr.Title: Format
DMUFormatCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Captures a specific state of the markup, displaying sections, measurements, annotations, etc.
DMUFormatCmdHdr.LongHelp:
1. Add the required markup features.
  2. Exit the format edition mode.
DMUGenerateFormatHdr.Title: Generate Format
DMUGenerateFormatHdr.ShortHelp: Generates the format using the slide definition
DMUEditAssociatedFormatHdr.Title: Edit Format
DMUEditAssociatedFormatHdr.ShortHelp: Edit the format associated to the slide
